consultation_packages.description: Initial consultation to understand your automation needs

consultation_packages.name: Strategy Consultation
consultation_packages.description: Comprehensive consultation to understand your needs and plan automation strategy

consultation_packages.name: Technical Planning

pricing.question: How much do your services cost?
pricing.answer: Our pricing is customized based on your specific needs, team size, and required features. We offer flexible packages from basic automation to enterprise solutions. We provide free consultations to understand your requirements and create custom pricing. Would you like to schedule a free discovery call to discuss your needs?
pricing.follow_up: I can connect you with our sales team for a detailed quote based on your specific requirements.

implementation.question: How quickly can you implement the system?
implementation.answer: Implementation time varies based on your specific needs and complexity. Typically, basic setups can be running within 2-4 weeks, while more complex enterprise implementations may take 6-8 weeks. We work closely with you throughout the process to ensure smooth implementation and provide ongoing support.
implementation.follow_up: Would you like to schedule a technical planning session to discuss your specific implementation timeline?

integration.question: Do you integrate with existing systems?
integration.answer: Yes, our solutions integrate seamlessly with your existing systems including CRM, accounting software, and other business tools. We provide custom integrations to ensure everything works together smoothly and your team can continue using familiar tools while gaining the benefits of AI automation.
integration.follow_up: What systems are you currently using? I can provide specific integration details for your setup.

support.question: What kind of support do you provide?
support.answer: We provide comprehensive support including 24/7 technical support, training for your team, regular updates, and ongoing consultation. Our support team is available to help with any questions or issues, and we provide regular check-ins to ensure everything is working optimally for your business.
support.follow_up: Would you like to learn more about our support packages and training programs?

demo.question: Can I see a demo?
demo.answer: Absolutely! We offer comprehensive demo packages that include custom proposals, research-based demo agents, and phone caller agents - all built specifically for your business to test. The demo package is delivered within 24-48 hours and is completely customized to your industry and needs.
demo.follow_up: Would you like me to schedule a custom demo package for your business? I'll need some basic information about your company and requirements.

technical_issues.response: I understand you're experiencing technical issues with our software. Let me gather some details and connect you with our technical support team who can resolve this quickly.

billing_inquiries.response: I'll help you with your billing inquiry. Let me connect you with our billing department who can review your account and resolve any billing questions.

feature_requests.response: Thank you for your feedback! We value customer input and regularly incorporate feature requests into our development roadmap. Let me document your request and connect you with our product team.

qualifying_questions: What type of field service business do you operate?
How many technicians do you have?
What are your main operational challenges?
What's your current system for managing field operations?
What's your timeline for implementing automation?
Who makes decisions about technology investments?
What's your monthly budget range for automation solutions?
